name: NVIDIA CUDA 9.1 with cuDNN v7
description: NVIDIA CUDA 9.1 with cuDNN v7 (7.1) on Ubuntu 16.04

Server.name: Server
Server.description: Launch a session with all boot services, including SSH (if installed).  Connection address and credentials will appear in your web browser once available.

GUI.name: GUI
GUI.description: Run a GUI command, and connect interactively directly from your web browser (requires Nimbix Desktop in image).
